name: Hungry Ball (maxgames)
description:
Hungry Ball is a three level maze-based game inspired by PacMan.  Have fun trying to eat your vitamins in a stressful environment. This game is definitely influenced by Graduate  school as I have eaten my way through the last 11 weeks.

It is made by Rachel Max in the Spring Quarter 2017 of Professor Patrick LeMieux's ART 224 Experimental Game Design Class at UC Davis.

This game has launched but is still in slow development.

I hope you like it!
